Package: org.grails.datastore.mapping.dynamodb.engine

[Java] Class ConstDynamoDBTableResolver

      • org.grails.datastore.mapping.dynamodb.engine.ConstDynamoDBTableResolver

      • An implementation of the table resolver which assumes there is no sharding - i.e. always the same table name for all the primary keys (for the same type of org.grails.datastore.mapping.model.PersistentEntity
